summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3669 , for the improvement of North 50th Street, from Fremont Avenue to a connection with the existing pavement of Stone Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45220 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
